snippet: A series of Sotheby’s auctions in Hong Kong recorded strong sales, even as confidence in the global economy wanes and Asian growth slows.
lead_paragraph: A series of Sotheby’s auctions in Hong Kong recorded strong sales, even as confidence in the global economy wanes and Asian growth slows.

headline.main: Record-Setting Diamond Sale Shows Appetite for Luxury in Asia
headline.print_headline: Record-Setting Diamond Sale Shows Appetite for Luxury in Asia
